timeline.message:
Add connection lifetime metrics

Motivation:
A nopen and close event on connections can be listening using `ConnectionPoolListner` only on the client-side.
However, there is no way to get the status of connections on server-side.
This PR will provide `armeria.{server,client}.conneciton.lifetime` metrics
for better monitoring of the connection lifetime.

Modifications:
* Add `keepAliveTimer` to `KeepAliveHandler`.
* Record connection lifetime when a connection is closed.

Result:
You can now get a connection lifetime metric using
`armeria.{server,client}.conneciton.lifetime`.
